Competencies.Name: Networking & Co-Creation
Competencies.Explanation: "This technique is very fast to transfer knowledge to students and help the student to have more confidence in her/his ability to think and solve problems instead of just memorizing the content of the course." This quote indicates that active student participation and co-creation of knowledge are encouraged, fostering networking skills and collaborative relationships.

Competencies.Name: Business & Entrepreneurial Literacy
Competencies.Explanation: "Topics analyzed include analysis of financial markets..." This quote highlights the focus on understanding financial markets, which is essential for business and entrepreneurial literacy..

Competencies.Name: Economic & Financial Literacy
Competencies.Explanation: "Topics analyzed include analysis of financial markets..." This quote emphasizes the analysis of financial markets, which is a key component of economic and financial literacy.
